review: I love this product, we can connect our apple products to the TV and can mirror whatever we are looking at.  It is great for showing off pictures to a large group.  You can also stream your videos from any apple products.  As a bonus you can also stream from your favorite apps. Great for the TV's that are not Internet ready and want to watch Netflix on it!  The negative i give it is that i wish the remote was a little bit bigger and easier to use.  There are only 3 buttons on the remote.
author: Anthony "Anthony"

review: I honestly was really hesitant on getting an Apple TV. I didn't think I did much aside from being able to watch Netflix and youtube and my iphone stuff (since my TV is not a smart tv figured this was best option either way) but this little thing has so many more features then I expected. Really worth getting it as you can watch all your Cable on demand channels, use any of your favorite movie/show apps, connect your iphone wirelessly, and listen to all your favorite music. The quality and wireless connectivity is seemless and great.
author: Amazon Customer
